name: Adv. C/C Panel "Albatross"
description: The highest-performance rigid panel in current service. Advanced 3D-woven carbon-carbon fabric with an iridium oxide refractory coating sustains continuous 1250 K operation, pushing specific rejection above 127 kW/m². The 14,100 m² panel array masses only 29.5 tonnes — a consequence of the composite's exceptional specific stiffness and ultra-low 2.1 kg/m² areal density. Mandatory for skutterudite-class thermoelectric generators and any vessel where radiator mass is a first-order design constraint.
